tool_description:
Easily follow and track your favorite artists on SongMeanings!
Be the first to know about new lyrics, song meanings & more!
name: SongMeanings
title: SongMeanings

api_list.name: comments.get
api_list.description: Get comments from our database for a specific song.

required_parameters.name: lyric_title
required_parameters.description: The song, track or lyric title

optional_parameters.name: sm_lid
optional_parameters.description: If SM lyric_id is known, then this will bypass artist_name and lyric_title

optional_parameters.name: parent_id
optional_parameters.description: When specified, method will return any replies for parent comment.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Set what type of comments to return

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Starting page of comments

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Set how many comments returned per page

optional_parameters.name: page_order
optional_parameters.description: Order by a specific field (date or rating)

optional_parameters.name: page_sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort by ascending or descending (asc or desc)

api_list.name: artists.search
api_list.description: Search the SongMeanings database for artist names and aliases.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Starting page of comments

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Set how many comments returned per page

optional_parameters.name: matchmode
optional_parameters.description: Configure how matching occurs (see further parameter values)

api_list.name: lyrics.get
api_list.description: Retrieves lyrics and lyric related data for a specific song.

required_parameters.name: sm_lid
required_parameters.description: SongMeanings Lyric ID. When specified, this parameter will bypass any other lyric identification parameters.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Decide the output type (either xml or json); xml is default.

optional_parameters.name: spotify_id
optional_parameters.description: If specified, a match will attempt to be made via spotify_id. Please note that if parameter is used, the API will also require lyric_title and artist_name as a backup attempt.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: This parameter is used to track, and report, any offline cached views of lyrics.

api_list.name: songs.search

optional_parameters.name: sm_aid
optional_parameters.description: SongMeapings Artist ID. When defined, engine will search query for any song titles found under the artist specified.

optional_parameters.name: q_artist
optional_parameters.description: Artist name. When defined and Artist ID acquired, engine will search query for any song titles found under the artist specified. If both sm_aid and q_artist are defined, sm_aid will always supercede.

optional_parameters.name: index
optional_parameters.description: Additional indexes to search in addition to song titles (see further parameter values)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Starting page of comments

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Set how many comments returned per page

optional_parameters.name: matchmode
optional_parameters.description: Configure how matching occurs (see further parameter values)

api_list.name: users.favorite.get
api_list.description: Get a user’s favorites by specified type.

required_parameters.name: sm_uid
required_parameters.description: User ID to grab favorites for

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of favorites to retrieve (artists, lyrics)

api_list.name: users.password.reset
api_list.description: Allows for a user to reset their password. When initiated, method will send the user an email with a link to click. The link will bring the user to desktop SongMeanings where the user will complete the password reset.

required_parameters.name: sm_emai
required_parameters.description: The user’s email address on the account to be reset.

optional_parameters.name: sm_uid
optional_parameters.description: SM User ID of the user initiating the password reset request.

optional_parameters.name: sm_username
optional_parameters.description: SM Username of the user initiating the password reset request.
